org.mym.plog.formatter

Class DefaultFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mym.plog.formatter.DefaultFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatter

    public class DefaultFormatter
extends Object
implements Formatter
    Default implementation for Formatter, provide all supported types.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public String format(String msg,
                     Object... params)
              throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        Format msg with params and return.

        NOTE VERY IMPORTANT: Sub implementation can decide whether discard one or more arguments, so make sure you are using right Formatter in right usage.

        Specified by:
        format in interface Formatter
        Parameters:
        msg - msg to be formatted. If this is null or empty but params provided, params still should be formatted.
        params - params to format msg. maybe empty.
        Returns:
        formatted msg.
        Throws:
        Exception - any type of Exception can be thrown by implementation when format failed.
